fields.name: Author
fields.description: The author of the custom image.

fields.name: CreationDate
fields.description: The creation date of the custom image.

fields.name: CustomImagePlan
fields.description: Storage information about the plan related to this custom image

fields.name: DataDiskStorageInfo
fields.description: Storage information about the data disks present in the custom image

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the custom image.

fields.name: IsPlanAuthorized
fields.description: Whether or not the custom images underlying offer/plan has been enabled for programmatic deployment

fields.name: ManagedImageId
fields.description: The Managed Image Id backing the custom image.

fields.name: ManagedSnapshotId
fields.description: The Managed Snapshot Id backing the custom image.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

fields.name: UniqueIdentifier
fields.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

fields.name: VM
fields.description: The virtual machine from which the image is to be created.

fields.name: Vhd
fields.description: The VHD from which the image is to be created.
